<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <identifier>

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/112165</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/112165</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Kako se giblje?</string>
            <string language="en">How does it move?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie bewegt sie?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment se déplace-t-elle ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como se move?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come si muove?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς κινείται;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Cómo se mueve?</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">V 4. r raziskujemo gibanje in ugotavljamo, da se bitja in predmeti gibljejo na različne načine. Učenci že poznajo in ločijo zunanji ter notranji pogon. Če nimamo delovnega učbenika, lahko preverimo razumevanje obeh vrst pogona z učnim listom.</string>
            <string language="en">Observing different objects that move and describing why do they move as they do (type of ground, legs/wheels, engine, ...)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">gibanje</string>
            <string language="en">motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">energija</string>
            <string language="en">energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">pogon</string>
            <string language="en">drive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kolo</string>
            <string language="en">wheel</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Beobachten der unterschiedlichen Nachrichten, die 
bewegen und das Beschreiben, warum sie, bewegen, wie sie (Typ des 
Bodens, legs/wheels, Maschine...)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Observer les différents objets qui se déplacent et 
décrire pourquoi  elles se déplacent comme le font elles (type de 
terre, legs/wheels, moteur...)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Observar os objetos diferentes que se movem e descrever 
porque  movem-se como  (tipo de terra, legs/wheels, motor...)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'osservazione degli oggetti differenti che si muovono e 
descrivere perchè si muovono come (tipo di terra, legs/wheels, 
motore...)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρατηρώντας τα διαφορετικά αντικείμενα που κινούνται 
και περιγράφοντας γιατί κινούνται όπως (να δακτυλογραφήσουν του 
εδάφους, των ποδιών/των ροδών, της μηχανής...)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La observación de diversos objetos que se muevan y 
describir porqué lo hacen se mueven como lo hacen (el tipo de tierra,
legs/wheels, motor...)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Laufwerk</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mouvement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lecteur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">roue</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">movimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">movimentação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">roda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">movimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">azionamento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rotella</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κίνηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κίνηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ρόδα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">movimiento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">energía</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">mecanismo impulsor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">rueda</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
